definitions.title: n.gent.pl.
definitions.body: Lybians, in N. Africa, W. of Egypt;—Na 3:9 ( + [[פּוּט]]), 2Ch 12:3 (LXX Libuev; + [[מִחְרַיִם]], [[סֻכִּיִּים]], [[כּוּשִׁים]]), 2Ch 16:8 LXX Libuev; (+ [[כּוּוִים]]); [[לֻבִַים]] Da 11:43 (v. Baer; c. [[מִחְרַיִם]], [[כֻּשִַׁים]]), Theod. Libuwn; prob. = [[לְהָבִים]] (q. v.) Ge 10:13 = 1Ch 1:11 A LXXL Labieim; read [[לוּבים]] perh. also Je 46:9 (for HCT [[לוּדִים]], cf. Sta:Javan 5f.), LXX Ludoi ([[פּוּט]] ib. = Libuev); LXX Sm Co Sta:Javan 6 Berthol rd. [[לוּב]] Ez Eze 30:5 (for HCT [[כּוּב]], q. v.) See WMM:As. Eur. 115.
